CustomField.description: Statut de la demande d'expérience professionnelle correspondant Front Office
CustomField.formula: CASE(Status, "Brouillon en cours de saisie", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/pencil.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_En_Cours_De_Saisie, "Brouillon en cours de validation", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/hourglass.png","")+$Label.Convsta_Case_Status_Front_Office_Brouillon_en_cours_de_validation, "Demande soumise", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/hourglass.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_Soumise , "Demande en cours de validation pédagogique", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/hourglass.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_En_Cours_De_Validation , "Demande en cours de validation administrative", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/hourglass.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_En_Cours_De_Validation , "Demande validée et en attente de contrat à uploader", IMAGE("/resource/1548319764000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/email.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_Validee_En_Attente_De_Contrat_A_Uploader , "Convention en attente de signature", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/hourglass.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Convention_Emise_Et_Envoyee_Pour_Signature , "Convention signée", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/accept.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Convention_Signee , "Demande refusée", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cross.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_Refusee , "Demande de complément d’information", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/pencil.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Demande_En_Attente_De_Vos_Corrections , "Brouillon annulé", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cancel.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Brouillon_Annule , "Brouillon expiré", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cancel.png","")+TEXT(Status) , "Expérience validée", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/tick.png","")+$Label.Convsta_Case_Status_Front_Office_Experience_Validee, "Evaluée", IMAGE("/internships/resource/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/tick.png","")+$Label.Convsta_StatusFront_Evaluee, TEXT(Status)+'non géré')
CustomField.label: Statut(FO)
